title: White House gun control plan yet to materialize
text:
White House gun control plan yet to materialize Thursday, March 08, 2018 - 01:59 
Three weeks after the nation's worst high school shooting, U.S. President Donald Trump met on Thursday with the makers of violent video games ''Grand Theft Auto'' and ''Doom'', as a promised White House plan to combat gun violence remains under wraps.   
Three weeks after the nation's worst high school shooting, U.S. President Donald Trump met on Thursday with the makers of violent video games "Grand Theft Auto" and "Doom", as a promised White House plan to combat gun violence remains under wraps.  //www.reuters.com/video/2018/03/09/white-house-gun-control-plan-yet-to-mate?videoId=407324677&videoChannel=13421
